synopsis.text:
Unknown to him, college student Keiichi Morisato's life takes a divine turn when he mistakenly dials the Goddess Help Line while ordering take-out food. He is greeted by Belldandy, a beautiful goddess who offers to grant him one wish. Thinking it to be a prank, Keiichi wishes for Belldandy to be his girlfriend 'forever'. To his surprise, his wish is granted, and Belldandy appears before him, leading to a series of unexpected events.

After being expelled from his dormitory for having a female guest, Keiichi and Belldandy move into an old shrine. Their peaceful life is soon disrupted by the arrival of Belldandy's sisters, Urd and Skuld. The trio's antics and Keiichi's attempts to navigate his newfound relationship with a goddess make for a hilarious and heartwarming tale.

In this five-episode OVA, "Oh My Goddess!" offers a unique and inventive take on the classic anime formula. Keiichi's journey to find love and acceptance in his new life with Belldandy is filled with laughter, challenges, and a touch of the divine. Will Keiichi be able to convince everyone that Belldandy is a foreign student? And will he find the courage to pursue a romance with a goddess? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
